name: Night City Pinball Ultimate LT
description:
With the Night City Pinball Ultimate you can play the pinball arcade like in your childhood. Tap the ball to launch, tap left and right side to operate the paddles! And most of all Enjoy!

Features:
-Easy to play like the real one
-Fits for all ages
-Cool Pinball graphics
-Original Pinball sounds

This is the free version with a few ads - You can find the ad free version in the store.
